text: This song perfectly captures the intensity of what is about to transpire. All the leitmotifs of Primal Dialga and the Time Gears are in this song, as if it's a culmination of your entire journey.

author: IkitoYukaru

text:
! loved this game much more than explorers of time/darkness. The special episodes were all very good, with great storylines and amazing music. This game is on par with the originals if you ask me.

as for temporal tower, i like the track but fortune ravine is my favourite.
author: Vaughan Pruden

text: Do It!!!! even if you don't like pokemon, you'll enjoy it, since the gameplay is awesome. The dungeons are randomly generated each time you enter one, so its a new adventure each time. The gameplay is turnbased, but it feels like its live action because you can make moves as fast or slow as you want to and the AI (for enemy pokemon) moves whenever you do.  The story is a lot better then most games too :D My Explorer games probably have more actual playtime then my main series games.
